name: final-project-tiketku
description: a service/API to purchase and book flight tickets online

scripts.seed:all: node ./database/seedCity.js && node ./database/seedAirport.js && node ./database/seedAirline.js && node ./database/seedService.js && node ./database/seedUser.js && node ./database/seedFlight.js && node ./database/seedFlightService.js && node ./database/seedBaggage.js && node ./database/seedSchedule.js && node ./database/seedSeat.js && node ./database/seedBooking.js && node ./database/seedItinerary.js && node ./database/seedBookedSeat.js && node ./database/seedInvoice.js && node ./database/seedPayment.js && node ./database/seedPassenger.js
scripts.setup: npm run db:reset && npm run seed:all && echo "If there is no error above, then you have successfully setup the database."
